Amenoma_Kageuchi.description: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.
Amenoma_Kageuchi.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
Amenoma_Kageuchi.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Sword Billet, 50x Amethyst Lump, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Amenoma_Kageuchi.effect: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates 6~12 Energy for each seed consumed.

Aquila_Favonia.description: The sword of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evilâ€”just like the last heroine who wielded it.
Aquila_Favonia.name: Aquila Favonia
Aquila_Favonia.effect: ATK is increased by 20~40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100~160% of ATK and dealing 200~320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Blackcliff_Longsword.description: A sword made of blackstone. It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.
Blackcliff_Longsword.name: Blackcliff Longsword
Blackcliff_Longsword.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Cool_Steel.description: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.
Cool_Steel.name: Cool Steel
Cool_Steel.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12~24%.

Dark_Iron_Sword.description: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.
Dark_Iron_Sword.name: Dark Iron Sword
Dark_Iron_Sword.effect: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20~40% for 12s.

Dull_Blade.description: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.
Dull_Blade.name: Dull Blade

Favonius_Sword.description: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!
Favonius_Sword.name: Favonius Sword
Favonius_Sword.effect: CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

Festering_Desire.description: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.
Festering_Desire.name: Festering Desire
Festering_Desire.obtained: The Chalk Prince and the Dragon Event
Festering_Desire.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16~32% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6~12%.

Fillet_Blade.description: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.
Fillet_Blade.name: Fillet Blade
Fillet_Blade.effect: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240~400% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15~11s.

Freedom-Sworn.description: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.
Freedom-Sworn.name: Freedom-Sworn
Freedom-Sworn.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by 10~20%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by 16~32% and increases ATK by 20~40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Harbinger_of_Dawn.description: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.
Harbinger_of_Dawn.name: Harbinger of Dawn
Harbinger_of_Dawn.effect: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14~28%.

Iron_Sting.description: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.
Iron_Sting.name: Iron Sting
Iron_Sting.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Sword Billet, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Iron_Sting.effect: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6~12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

Lion_Roar.description: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.
Lion_Roar.name: Lion's Roar
Lion_Roar.effect: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20~36%.

Mistsplitter_Reforged.description: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.
Mistsplitter_Reforged.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
Mistsplitter_Reforged.effect: Gain a 12~24% Elemental DMG Bonus for every element and receive the might of Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 8/16/28~16/32/56% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Primordial_Jade_Cutter.description: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.
Primordial_Jade_Cutter.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
Primordial_Jade_Cutter.effect: HP increased by 20~40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2~2.4% of the wielder's Max HP.

Prototype_Rancour.description: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.
Prototype_Rancour.name: Prototype Rancour
Prototype_Rancour.obtained:
- Adventure Rank 10 Reward
- Forging (1x Northlander Sword Billet, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
- Stellar Reunion
Prototype_Rancour.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4~8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Royal_Longsword.description: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.
Royal_Longsword.name: Royal Longsword
Royal_Longsword.effect: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Sacrificial_Sword.description: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
Sacrificial_Sword.name: Sacrificial Sword
Sacrificial_Sword.effect: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s.

Silver_Sword.description: A sword for chasing away demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.
Silver_Sword.name: Silver Sword

Skyrider_Sword.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...
Skyrider_Sword.name: Skyrider Sword
Skyrider_Sword.effect: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12~24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Skyward_Blade.description: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.
Skyward_Blade.name: Skyward Blade
Skyward_Blade.effect: Crit Rate increased by 4~8%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and increases the DMG of Normal and Charged Attack hits by 20~40% for 12s.

Summit_Shaper.description: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.
Summit_Shaper.name: Summit Shaper
Summit_Shaper.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Sword_of_Descension.description: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.
Sword_of_Descension.name: Sword of Descension
Sword_of_Descension.effect: Hitting enemies with Normal or Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66.

The_Alley_Flash.description: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.
The_Alley_Flash.name: The Alley Flash
The_Alley_Flash.effect: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 12~24%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

The_Black_Sword.description: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.
The_Black_Sword.name: The Black Sword
The_Black_Sword.effect:
Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20~40%.
Additionally, regenerates 60~100% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

The_Flute.description: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.
The_Flute.name: The Flute
The_Flute.effect: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100~200% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

Traveler_Handy_Sword.description: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.
Traveler_Handy_Sword.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
Traveler_Handy_Sword.effect: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1~2% HP.
